articles.description: Dejan Kulusevski heads an equaliser in the 90th minute as Tottenham earn a dramatic Premier League draw against Manchester City.
articles.title: Kulusevski late leveller for Spurs rocks Man City

articles.description: Pep Guardiola says he "will not do a Mikel Arteta comment" when asked about a controversial stoppage late in Manchester City's dramatic 3-3 draw with Tottenham.
articles.title: 'I won't do an Arteta comment' - Guardiola

articles.description: West Indies captain Shai Hope hits an unbeaten 109 to guide his side to a four-wicket win over England.
articles.title: England lose thriller in opening ODI in West Indies

articles.description: Jurgen Klopp says he doesn't think he has seen "a game with this amount of beautiful goals" after his Liverpool side beat Fulham in thriller.
articles.title: 'I've never seen a game with this many beautiful goals'

articles.description: Barcelona beat Atletico Madrid with Joao Felix scoring the only goal of the game against his parent club.
articles.title: Joao Felix helps Barcelona beat parent club Atletico

articles.description: Enzo Fernandez scores twice as 10-man Chelsea hold on to beat Brighton in a five-goal thriller at Stamford Bridge.
articles.title: Ten-man Chelsea hold on to beat Brighton

articles.description: World number one Scottie Scheffler wins the Hero World Challenge in the Bahamas as Tiger Woods finishes 18th in the 20-man field on his return from injury.
articles.title: Scheffler wins in Bahamas as Woods finishes 18th

articles.description: Rory McIlroy says he cannot understand "anger" towards plans to roll back golf-ball technology to reduce the distance they can travel.
articles.title: McIlroy backs plans to reduce golf ball distances

articles.description: Inter Milan move back to the top of the Serie A table thanks to a big victory at defending champions Napoli.
articles.title: Inter Milan beat champions Napoli to go top

articles.description: Ollie Watkins heads in a 90th-minute equaliser as Aston Villa twice came from behind to draw with Bournemouth in a thrilling Premier League game.
articles.title: Watkins rescues point for Villa at Bournemouth
